name: CHAOS CORRIDOR
description: We are a team of three flatmates and we did not have anything better to do in this quarantine time so we decided to try what can we do in three days. For two of us, it is the first experience with Unity ever and one of us has done some previous projects in Unity. This is the person who is responsible for this weekend full of fun and who is cursed by the rest of the team for this great idea. 😄 So the question was: What could be better than GameJam with poor knowledge of Unity?
